tool.name: GAIAC wind rose plot
tool.description: between wind speed and wind direction
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This tool generates a wind rose plot.
-----
**Inputs** Windrose plot * **--infile** Input data frame as a tabular file. * **--column_list_dir** Choose the wind direction column in the dataset from the list * **--column_list_ws** Choose the wind speed column in the dataset from the list
-----
**Outputs** * Returns png file with the windrose plot
